EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-11-15
EmailTemplate.subject: PKS Wins 2018 Tech Innovator Award
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 15, 2018 <[[https://www.crn.com/slide-shows/data-center/the-2018-tech-innovator-awards/7]]> Pivotal Container Service Wins 2018 Tech Innovator Award Pivotal Container Service won CRN's 2018 Tech Innovator award for Container Technology for its ability to bring enterprise and service providers a production-ready version of Kubernetes. Learn More <[[https://www.crn.com/slide-shows/data-center/the-2018-tech-innovator-awards/7]]> <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/joshmckenty/2018/11/12/struggling-with-high-performance-teams-you-might-need-some-brain-science/#7ddbe9e93601]]> Struggling With High-Performance Teams? You Might Need Some Brain Science Joshua McKenty, Vice President of the System's Advisory Group at Pivotal, on the magic set of ingredients that makes a team perform well. Check it Out <[[https://www.forbes.com/sites/joshmckenty/2018/11/12/struggling-with-high-performance-teams-you-might-need-some-brain-science/#7ddbe9e93601]]> <https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/appearance-practice-why-safe-falls-short-agile-enterprise-jesse-bean/> In Appearance, But Not in Practice Why SAFe falls short for the agile enterprise. Here's Why <[[https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/appearance-practice-why-safe-falls-short-agile-enterprise-jesse-bean/]]> <[[https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/questionnaire?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/rabbitmqsummit.png?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> RabbitMQ Summit Panel Recap Dormain Drewitz breaks down the key points from the RabbitMQ Summit Panel at the inaugural RabbitMQ Summit in London. Check it Out <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/rabbitmqsummit.png?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://thenewstack.io/cloud-native-challenges-and-opportunities-with-continuous-delivery/> Cloud Native Challenges and Opportunities With Continuous Delivery Ian Andrews, Vice President of Products at Pivotal, discusses why continuous delivery is at the heart of the cloud-native movement and more on The New Stack Makers podcast. Listen In <[[https://thenewstack.io/cloud-native-challenges-and-opportunities-with-continuous-delivery/]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/teaching-tdd-to-different-learning-styles?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=sprout&utm_content=1541713344?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> "Learning is Not 'One Size Fits All'" Tiffany Larson of HCSC walks through how to identify a person's learning style and what techniques can be leveraged in order to create the most productive learning environment at SpringOne Platform 2018. Watch Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/teaching-tdd-to-different-learning-styles?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=sprout&utm_content=1541713344?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/mercedes-daimler?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Adopting PCF at an Automobile Manufacturer Daimler AG is one of the biggest producers of premium cars and the world's biggest manufacturer of commercial vehicles with a global reach. Learn how we help them expand their luxury experience. Check it Out <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/mercedes-daimler?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 11/28, Continuous Delivery to the Cloud: Automate Thru Production with CI + Spinnaker, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/nov-28-continuous-delivery-to-the-cloud-automate-thru-production-with-ci-spinnaker-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
11/29, Better Deployments with Sub Environments Using Spring Cloud and Netflix Ribbon, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/nov-29-better-deployments-with-sub-environments-using-spring-cloud-and-netflix-ribbon-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
